name: Can Balls Meow?
description:
Fight CAT v CAT and tail whip your way to victory! 

Your goal is to beat the other opponent while taking as much of the cat food as possible to enhance the power of your attack.

Controls:

Player 1: W - Jump, S - Fastfall,  A/D - Left/Right, F - to pay respect attack

Player 2: I - Jump, K - Fastfall,  J/L - Left/Right, ; - attack

Credits:
